# BMIMIC

## Overview

This package is for generating example simulation data for BMIMIC model which is introduced in **paper**. More information can be found in **paper**.

## Install

```{r}
devtools::install_github("sooyongl/BMIMIC")
```


## Generate Data

```{r}
library(BMIMIC)

sdat <- makeDat()
```
